action_list.description: System action for starting an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# add each item in the node array to the Ansible hosts file
hosts=$(echo "@@{AnsibleNode.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

for host in $hosts
do
   printf "${host}\n" | sudo tee -a /etc/ansible/hosts
done

echo "@@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@" | sudo tee -a /home/@@{sshkey.username}@@/.ssh/known_hosts

action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# perform some setup, first - hostname, package updates
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname @@{NODE_HOSTNAME}@@

sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y upgrade

# install some useful packages
sudo yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion

# required for nodes that have SELinux installed
sudo yum -y install libselinux-python

sudo yum -y remove firewalld

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
